content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the claimant and the defendant the claimant was awarded a hyundai santa fe vehicle and a metal garage while the defendant was awarded a toyota avensis vehicle a car trailer a construction item and a selfpropelled honda petrol lawnmower the court referenced several articles from the civil code including those related to shareable property deviation of equal shares establishing asset balance determining asset value and the right to compensation the claimant filed a lawsuit to dissolve the marriage and requested the division of assets recognition of personal liabilities and payment of costs the court granted the claimants request assigned personal liabilities to each party and ordered them to share the costs of the proceedings the court also dissolved the marriage party a claimant received the hyundai santa fe and metal garage while party b defendant received the toyota avensis car trailer construction item and lawnmower both parties have personal obligations towards banks leasing agreements and mobile communications service contracts party b is also responsible for paying the costs of the proceedings amounting to 50 euros
